price: 221. Sinaamey siinih warsoo?keenik ixxic Nabiyow isheetoona elle obta mara,
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
